node.title: Alan Jones leaves Sky News after turning down new timeslot
node.description: Veteran broadcaster Alan Jones reveals that he has been dumped from his prime time program on Sky News.
node.content: ["Veteran broadcaster Alan Jones has revealed that he has been dumped from his prime time program on Sky News.", "In a statement, Jones said he had been informed by the management at Sky News that his contract, which ends on November 30, would\u00a0not be renewed.", "The longtime radio and TV host said he had been offered an alternative weekly slot on a streaming platform, which he declined.", "\"All sorts of reasons were proffered, including the fact that, after 35 years of radio success, I was being told that my work 'didn't resonate',\" Jones said.", "Paul Whittaker, chief executive officer of Sky News Australia said: \"Regrettably Alan has decided not to accept a new role that was offered to him for next year. We respect his decision and know he will be missed by many.\"", "More to follow."]
